creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red and dark blue blouse; decorating blouse are stripes made of small white shells; located along blouse's side and near neck opening are multicolored decorative frays; neck opening consists of a vertical slit; sleeves consist of slits cut at side and are decorated with white shells
title: Woman's top
